titles.title: ACCESS Act 2009
Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2009
To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish additional goals for airport master plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/11/2009--Introduced. Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2009 or the ACCESS Act 2009 - Encourages airport sponsors and state and local officials in the development of their airport master plans to take into account as additional goals: (1) customer convenience and access to airport facilities; and (2) threats of a terrorist attack, including the need to continually adjust plans to address new terrorist threats.
